text: This is a list of cars, buses, vans and trucks made by BYD Auto and the Denza, Yangwang and Fangchengbao brands. == Current passenger vehicles == === BYD brand === Body style Model Current generation Vehicle description Image Name(s) Chinese name Series Introduction ( year) Facelift Sedan Destroyer 05 / Chazor / King / Seal 5 驱逐舰05 Ocean 2022 - PHEV compact sedan Marketed as the Chazor in Uzbekistan, as the King in Latin America, and as the Seal 5 DM-i in the Philippines. e3 e3 e (Ocean) 2019 - BEV compact sedan, the sedan version of the e2. e7 e7 e (Ocean) Upcoming - BEV mid-size sedan. e9 e9 e (Ocean) 2021 2022 BEV mid-size sedan based on the Han EV, a fleet-oriented model exclusive to China. Han / 汉DM-i / 汉DM-p Dynasty 2020 2024 PHEV full-size sedan. Han EV 汉EV Dynasty BEV full-size sedan. Han L / 汉L / 汉L Dynasty 2025 - PHEV full-size sedan. Han L EV 汉L EV Dynasty BEV full-size sedan. Qin L 秦L Dynasty 2024 - PHEV mid size sedan. Qin L EV 秦L EV Dynasty 2025 - BEV mid-size sedan. Qin Plus 秦PLUS Dynasty 2021 2025 PHEV compact sedan, the pre-facelift model was marketed as the Qin Pro. Qin Plus EV 秦PLUS EV Dynasty BEV compact sedan, the pre-facelift model was marketed as the Qin Pro. Seal 海豹 Ocean 2022 - BEV mid-size sedan. Seal 05 海豹05 Ocean 2025 - PHEV compact sedan, the pre-facelift model was marketed as the Destroyer 05. Seal 06 海豹06 Ocean 2024 - PHEV mid-size sedan. Seal 06 EV 海豹06 EV Ocean Upcoming - BEV mid-size sedan. Seal 07 海豹07 Ocean 2023 - PHEV full-size sedan, previously Seal . Station wagon Seal 06 Travel Edition 海豹06 旅行版 Ocean Upcoming - PHEV mid-size wagon. Hatchback Dolphin 海豚 Ocean 2021 2025 BEV compact hatchback. e2 e2 e (Ocean) 2019 2023 BEV compact hatchback, the hatchback version of the e3. Seagull / Dolphin Mini/Surf 海鸥 Ocean 2023 2025 BEV city car. Marketed as the Dolphin Mini in Latin America. Seal 06 GT 海豹06 GT Ocean 2024 - BEV mid-size hatchback. Crossover SUV Frigate 07 护卫舰07 Ocean 2022 - PHEV mid-size crossover SUV. Sealion 05 海狮05 Ocean 2024 2025 PHEV compact crossover SUV. Sealion 05 EV 海狮05 EV Ocean 2025 - BEV compact crossover SUV. Sealion 07 / 海狮07 / 海狮07 Ocean 2025 - PHEV mid-size crossover SUV, the pre- facelift model was marketed as the Frigate 07. Sealion 07 EV / Sealion 7 海狮07 EV Ocean 2024 - BEV mid-size crossover SUV. Song L 宋L Dynasty 2024 - PHEV mid- size crossover SUV. Song L EV 宋L EV Dynasty 2023 - BEV mid-size crossover SUV. Song Plus / Seal U / Sealion 6 宋PLUS Ocean 2020 2023 PHEV compact crossover SUV. Song Plus / Seal U EV 宋PLUS EV BEV compact crossover SUV. Song Pro 宋Pro Dynasty 2019 2024 PHEV compact crossover SUV. Tang / 唐DM-i / 唐DM-p Dynasty 2018 2024 PHEV mid-size crossover SUV. Tang EV 唐EV BEV mid-size crossover SUV. Tang L / 唐L DM-i /唐L DM-p Dynasty 2025 - PHEV mid-size crossover SUV. Tang L EV 唐L EV BEV mid-size crossover SUV. Yuan Plus / Atto 3 元PLUS Dynasty 2022 2025 BEV compact crossover SUV. Yuan Up/Pro / S1 Pro / Atto 2 元UP Dynasty 2024 - BEV subcompact crossover SUV. MPV/ minivan D1 D1 e (Ocean) 2020 - BEV two-row compact MPV purpose-built for ride- hailing services DiDi. e6 e6 e (Ocean) 2021 - BEV compact MPV for taxi use, based on the Song Max. M6 / eMax 7 - - 2024 - BEV three-row compact MPV based on the e6 and Song Max, not available in China. Xia 夏 Dynasty 2024 - PHEV MPV/minivan.
